title: The Ten Dollar Raise
text: The Ten Dollar Raise is a 1921 American <a href="silent%20film">silent</a> <a href="comedy%20film">comedy film</a> directed by <a href="Edward%20Sloman">Edward Sloman</a> and starring <a href="William%20V.%20Mong">William V. Mong</a>, <a href="Marguerite%20De%20La%20Motte">Marguerite De La Motte</a>, and <a href="Pat%20O%27Malley%20%28actor%29">Pat O'Malley</a>.
